Class FirstScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FirstScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class FirstScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Class object representing the first screen view of the Inventory Management system.
    Author:
    Andrew Cesar-Metzgus

      • onPartQueryTyped

        public void onPartQueryTyped​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Filters the part table based on user input.


        LOGICAL ERROR When looking up by both (int) ID and (String) name, if the name included a number, the filter would return the same part twice. I added a logical check if an instance of that part was already in the results list to ensure that are not duplicates.

        Parameters:
        keyEvent - User begins to type.

      • onProductQueryTyped

        public void onProductQueryTyped​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Filters the product table based on user input.


        LOGICAL ERROR When looking up by both (int) ID and (String) name, if the name included a number, the filter would return the same Product twice. I added a logical check if an instance of that Product was already in the results list to ensure that are not duplicates.

        Parameters:
        keyEvent - User begins to type.
